original_text: And he sent him away to his house, saying, Neither go into the town, nor tell it to any in the town.
korean_text: 예수께서 그 사람을 집으로 보내시며 이르시되 마을에는 들어가지 말라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And he sent him away to his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그를 그의 집으로 보냈다

sentences.original_text: saying, Neither go into the town
nor tell it to any in the town
